E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/22/1974
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Pete Cimino



Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1974
Subject: Progress of Sergio Ferrer
Dear Sir,
Sergio Ferrer has nothing more to prove at A Lynchburg Twins!
He has an AVG of .370 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/30/1974
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Jesus Alou
